text: Lowestoft railway station is a station in Suffolk, England for Lowestoft. Trains are currently run by Greater Anglia. ==Trains== Company Line Stations Train Type Times Greater Anglia Wherry Lines Norwich - Brundall Gardens - Brundall - Buckenham - Cantley - Reedham -Haddiscoe - Somerleyton - Oulton Broad North - Lowestoft Class 153 Class 156 Class 170 1tph Greater Anglia East Suffolk Line Ipswich - Westerfield - Woodbridge - Melton - Wickham Market - Saxmundham - Darsham - Halesworth - Brampton (Suffolk) - Beccles - Oulton Broad South - Lowestoft Class 153 Class 156 Class 170 1tp2h Category:Railway stations in Suffolk
